Gigs.MoreInfo:
Later At The Blue Room is an mini indoor festival that runs over both the consecutive bank holiday weekends at the end of April at the Blue Room pub in Blackpool from Thursday 21st April to Sunday 24th April and Thursday 28th April to Sunday 1st May.

There will be 80 bands performing over both weekends with 10 acts performing each night, there will be performances from Goonies Never Say Die, The Senton Bombs, Escape Artist, Ides Of March, My Preserver, Idol Minds, Makers Of Venice, Northern Structure, Hammer No More The Fingers, The Colours, Metonia, Bill Orrick, The Drop-Out Wives and many more

The format of the event is set up in the same way the 'Later with Jools Holland' programme works, there are 2 stages set up in the venue, as soon as one band finishes at one end of the pub the next band starts at the other end, they even have a 'fake Jools' to compere the night.

It runs from 7pm until late every night and is only £2 to get in
its all happening at The Blue Room, Church Street, Blackpool
updated listings can be found at www.facebook.com/theblueroomblackpool
you can follow us on twitter at www.twitter.com/blueroombpl

Please note the change of date for this event!

Blackpool’s very own Rock Hard Studios is opening its doors on Saturday the 8th of October, for a special one off open day. Since opening five years ago Rock Hard Studios has gone from strength to strength recording professional artists and local bands alike. 

The purpose of the day is to raise funds for Creative Tuition Trust, a local music charity. All money donated will be used to provide free tuition to local children in various musical instruments, ( Guitar, Keyboard, Drums, Singing, Bass, DJ'ing ect ). 

Follow us on:
http://www.facebook.com/pages/Creative-Tuition-Trust/201607773192977

So come down on October 8th to join in with our free workshops in drumming, guitar playing, D.J.’ing and recording. There will also be a BBQ on site, studio tours, a raffle and live bands playing throughout the day and night.

!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! A DAY NOT TO BE MISSED !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Playing on the day will be:

Veasey
Callighan N Wolski
Matt Billington
Big Door Open
Last Breath 
And More To Come!!!
